name: Discord Bot Maker Project
summary: A DISCORDBOT file is a project file created by Discord Bot Maker, a bot development tool for Discord. It does not contain any data, but is a shortcut used to open a project in Discord Bot Maker. DISCORDBOT files are always named project.discordbot and are located in the main directory of a bot project, along with other folders and files used by the project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
